listing_company_name: First National Real Estate O'Donoghues - Darwin
description:
This is the only apartment in Darwin where you can own your own floor! Positioned on the seventh floor second from the top with breathtaking views across Cullen Bay, Darwin Harbour and Larrakeyah, this City Fringe Suburb of Larrakeyah boasts an open floor plan larger than most Inner-city Darwin Apartments.


Featuring private lift access to your level only for extra security, expansive open plan living, dining and kitchen opening to the huge private balcony where you can sit back, relax and take in the magnificent views. There are 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes and the master bedroom enjoys a stunning large window to wake up to, spacious walk-in robe and ensuite with a large double shower and vanity!


*Features include:
*Spectacular open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, breakfast bar & stainless steel appliances
*Massive living and dining area opening onto the balcony
*Generous bathrooms with stone bench tops and separate shower and bath in main bathroom
*Separate internal laundry
*Tiled and air conditioned throughout
*Large Study alcove with desk in built
*Private lift access to your level only
*Two secure designated car spaces
*Amazing views over Larrakeyah, Cullen Bay & Darwin Harbour

A short stroll to the CBD, Local Cafes’, Cullen Bay, the Casino & Mindil Markets however still far enough from the hustle and noise of the City to provide a quiet escape after a long day put this property in a very desirable location. Tiled and air conditioned throughout for year-round comfort, this is great opportunity for someone who likes the convenience of having everything at your fingertips or an investor with an rental return of $800.00 per week with secure tenants in place to January 2023.

With so many great features this low maintenance apartment should not be missed. The building was designed for people wanting a quality lifestyle apartment!

Contact to arrange your inspection today!

Year Built: 2009
Area on Title: 181m2
Body Corp Manager: Body Corporate Specialists NT
Body Corp Fees
Admin Fees: $2,294.56/quarter (approx.)
Sinking fund: $362.50/quarter (approx.)
Council Rates: $375.00/quarter (approx.)
Property Status: Tenanted to January 2023 at $800 per week
